document.full_text: the european court of human rights said on tuesday it had found no proof that russia's jailing of former oil tycoon mikhail khodorkovsky on fraud and tax evasion charges was politically motivated.
document.title: eu court lacks proof of politics in khodorkovsky case
lines_and_colors: the european court of human rights said on tuesday it had found no proof that russia's jailing of former oil tycoon mikhail khodorkovsky on fraud and tax evasion charges was politically motivated.
